description: Changes the opt-in status of the specified zone group for your account.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Availability Zone group, Local Zone group, or Wavelength Zone group.

parameters.name: OptInStatus
parameters.description: Indicates whether to opt in to the zone group. The only valid value is opted-in. You must contact Amazon Web Services Support to opt out of a Local Zone or Wavelength Zone group.

nested_items.name: Return
nested_items.description: Is true if the request succeeds, and an error otherwise.
